summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2012 FORD FOCUS. WHILE DRIVING 75 MPH, THE POWER ASSIST INDICATOR ILLUMINATED AND THE STEERING WHEEL BECAME INOPERABLE. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO A LOCAL DEALER (AUTOMAX FORD 3301 E. CENTRAL TEXAS EXPY, KILLEEN, TX, 76543)  WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED; HOWEVER, THE CONTACT WAS NOT CLEAR ON THE DIAGNOSIS. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE AND A COMPLAINT WAS FILED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 150,000.
